import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import "./Register.scss" import React from "react" import {useState} from "react" const Register = () => { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ username:"", name:"", email:"", password:"", }) const handleChange = (e) =>{ setInputs((prev)=>({...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value})) } console.log(inputs) return (
